modName: Dragon Belly Home - Spouse Usable with Voiced NPC Quest
summary:
3modz - Dragon Belly
by Recon3Y3z

A spouse livable player home located under Dragon BridgeA spouse livable player home located under Dragon Bridge
descriptionHtml:
[size=14][b]3modz - Dragon Belly[/b][/size]
[b]by Recon3Y3z[/b]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
---- REMOVED ALL NAVMESHES UNTIL BETHESDA FINDS A FIX ----
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Skyrim 1.5 update has upgraded the navmesh bug to causing CTDs. 
To prevent crashes I have temporally removed all navmeshes from this mod. 
This means NPCs will walk around like it\'s vanilla Skyrim for now.

[size=4]A spouse usable player home located under Dragon Bridge with a voiced NPC ownership quest.[/size]

[youtube]WCuA7QaNlWM[/youtube]

[b]Features[/b]
-Ownership quest (purchase/murder)
-NPC with full voice dialog
-Ownable player home under dragon bridge
-Spouse can live in the home with you
-Fast travel map marker
-Tanning, enchanter, alchemy and cooking
-Chests, sachels, sacks, barrels and a safe
-All containers are new \"no respawn\" named references
-Garden and other ingredient plants
-Dock, Walking path and landscaping
-Increased river fish and mead
-Increased cheese and mead

[b]In-Progress[/b]
-Alternate ways to gain ownership of house
-NPC in Dragon Bridge to provide upgrades

[b]Known Issues[/b]
-No Navmeshes to prevent CTDs (still awaiting Bethesdas fix)

Please report bugs, I will fix them if I can:
https://bitbucket.org/Recon3Y3z/3modz_dragonbelly/issues

Dragon Bridge?
http://www.uesp.net/maps/srmap/srmap.shtml?centeron=Dragon+Bridge

Navmesh Bug? (now with CTDs)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RlNBVOcuW3M
http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1345681-navmesh-bug/page__st__150__p__20341090#entry20341090
author: Recon3Y3z
